slides.author: AI Engineer Events
slides.title: 5 Must-Have AI Engineer Skills in 2026
slides.subtitle: Essential competencies for modern AI engineers

slides.title: 1) End-to-End Product Ownership
slides.body: You need to transform existing models into usable and reliable software products.

slides.title: 2) Full-Stack Fundamentals
slides.body: While you don't need to be an expert in everything, you should be proficient in: Backend, Databases, APIs, and Deployment.

slides.title: 3) AI System Integration
slides.body: You need to go beyond model API calls. You should understand how to design workflows, handle failures, manage state, evaluate outputs, and ensure system maintainability.

slides.title: 4) Architecture & Software Discipline
slides.body: Master skills like testing, CI/CD, setting up environments, version control, and maintaining a clear project structure to create maintainable systems. This is crucial, especially since the use of AI can lead to unmaintainable systems.

slides.title: 5) Strong Requirement Translation
slides.body: You need to understand vague goals and be able to translate them into technical specifications and systems.

slides.title: Learn More
slides.body: I'm organizing a series of events to explore the AI engineering role and share my findings with you.

slides.supportingText: Join our session on defining the AI engineer role on Tue, Feb 24, 5:00 PM CET
